help.name: mris_curvature
help.description: This program will compute the second fundamental form of a cortical surface. It will create two new files <hemi>.<surface>.H and <hemi>.<surface>.K with the mean and Gaussian curvature respectively.

optional_flagged.explanation: save curvature files (will only generate screen output without this option)
perform <avgs> iterative averages of curvature measure before saving

help.example: mris_curvature lh.pial Compute the curvature and do not produce output files.
mris_curvature -w -a 10 lh.pial Smooth 10 iterations and produce output files.
